resources.string: We are a team of authentic Vedic astrologers from India
Ask your queries to a team of astrologers
We are right here to answer your queries

Life Prediction is a way to know your full life events with the help of astrological methods. Our Vedic astrologers will make your life prediction based on the knowledge and information you provide.You can order for yourself or someone else.
First of all vedic astrology is not a magic.Vedic astrology is combination of MATHS & SCIENCE of karmas. Everything which happens in the world is in god\'s hand only.

Vedic astrology is the technique to predict some future events on the basis of natal chart. Natal chart and other divisional charts are nothing but a karma\'s graph of individual. From the divisional and natal chart astrologer can conclude prediction. At last all depends on the karmas only. But vedic astrology is helping hand to predict the future.
It is the pure calculation of individual\'s past and present karmas. Also planets\' science needs to be implemented with the karmas calculation.

If compare western astrology then vedic astrology is more accurate. as per my view when mind stops working then vedic astrology can be a proper guidance to each and every single problem in individual\'s life.
• The prediction is always based on the data received by us and there may be a variation in prediction in light of the theory of karma related to concern person.
• We are not giving any commitment for any prediction given by us will be 100% result oriented.

• The base of prediction is always depending on micro mathematics which may be differ from the result of prediction for which we are not liable for any discrepancy and variation in any physical result for any prediction.
• Amount paid once should not be refunded in any circumstances.
• The reply time to any question is within 48 hours.
• Legal complication if any the jurisdiction will be at Rajkot.
• If you have any query regarding terms and conditions prior to accepting, please contact Planets Predictors at predictorplanet@gmail.com.
• The Planets Predictors services are provided “AS IS” and “AS AVAILABLE” and for entertainment purpose only.
• The Planets Predictors makes no representation, warranty, or guarantee regarding the reliability, timeliness, quality, suitability or availability of the planets predictor services.
• You expressly agree that the entire risk arising out of your use of the planets predictor services, and any service or products requested in connection therewith, remains solely with you.

Planets Predictors and third parties’ beneficiaries shall not be liable for indirect, special, punitive, exemplary, incidental or consequential damages including without limitation lost profits, lost data, personal damages planets predictor shall not be liable. We will not do any life or death prediction. If customer ask any lifeline or death related question then planets predictors is not liable to answer.
